FSTT is Faculty of sciences and techniques of Tangier .Created in 1995, the FSTT is one of the eight institutions of the Abdelmalek Essaadi University.
FST is faculty of science and technologies
FSTT is located in Boukhalef Tangier near the airport Ibn batota, Ancienne Route de l'airoport, Km 10, Ziaten. BP : 416. Tanger - Maroc

patterns: what are the education programs of DEUST ?
responses: The mission of the Tangier FST is to provide higher education in initial and continuing education and to carry out all research work in the disciplinary fields of science and technology and engineering sciences in particular.As part of the educational reform, the Tangier FST has adopted the architecture of the LMD system: Bachelor / Master / Doctorate. It prepares and delivers diplomas: -DEUST: Diploma of University Studies in Science and Technology. -LST: Bachelor of Science and Technology. -MST: Master Sciences and Techniques -STATE ENGINEERING DEGREE -Doctorate in Science and Technology -Alongside these diplomas, the FST is also authorised to award : -DUT: University Diploma in Technology

patterns: what are the education programs of LST or bachelor?
responses: LST or bachelor programs: -Computer Engineering -industrial engineering -Electronics, electrical engineering and automation -Biotechnologies (Options: animal and plant) -Civil Engineering -Applied Geosciences -Mathematical Engineering -STATISTICAL ENGINEERING -CHEMICAL ANALYSIS TECHNIQUES (TAC) -Industrial and Production Design (DIP) -Renewable Energies (RE) -Process Engineering

patterns: what are the education programs in engineering fields ?
responses: Engineering fields: -Geoinformation -Industrial management and organization -Software and computer systems (LSI) -Electronics, Electrical Engineering and Automation (EEA) -Design Fabrication Mechanical Design and Innovation (DFMI

patterns: what is the goal of mobiquity & big data Master program?
responses: the goal of mobiquity & big data Master program  is the extraction of relevant information from data and the mobility of systems is gradually becoming top priority of the various government institutions or the private sector, accordingly, new jobs are emerging. To accompany this vast movement, it is imperative to offer specialized training in this sector of activity.Recently, Big Data and mobicity have become real strategic and economic issue. Processing

patterns: What kind of educational training does FSTT offer?
responses: Tangier FST provides higher education in initial and continuing education

As part of the educational reform, the Tangier FST adopted the architecture of the LMD system: License / Master / Doctorate. It prepares and issues diplomas: -DEUST: University Diploma in Science and Technology -LST: Bachelor of Science and Technology -MST: Master Sciences and Techniques -DIPLOMA OF STATE ENGINEER -Doctorate in Science and Technology In addition to these diplomas, the FST is also empowered to issue: -DUT: University Diploma in Technology

patterns: You will take the diploma after how long in terms of the years of studies
responses: It depends on the type of diploma if it is DEUST it is after 2 years of which we study 4 semesters for the Bachelor degree  you have to spend 3 years And for the Master it is Bac + 5

The Faculty of Science and Technology of Tangier launches, for the 2019-2020 academic year, continuing education courses culminating in University Diploma.► Diploma of the Approval Cycle (DCA): (Bac + 3): This training is intended for specialized technicians of companies and holders of DEUG, DUT, BTS or diploma recognized equivalent (Bac + 2 minimum).It allows leavers to quickly integrate into the professional world or to adapt to new functions within the company. This training cycle lasts one year.► Diploma of the Cycle of Specialized Higher Studies (DCESS): (Bac + 5): This training is aimed at graduates of Bac + 3 minimum in situation of activity or not The device set up attaches, in its design, to create conditions for integration, reinsertion or adaptation to new functions in the company. This training cycle lasts two years.For more information, contact Pr. Omar AKOURRI: Project manager - Responsible for continuing education.Tel: +212664913791 / +212660104681 | Email: akourri.omar@hotmail.com / fc@fstt.ac.ma

patterns: There are just masters or also there are engineer cycles at fst?
responses: Yes Each fst includes 2 different study paths The first is to have Master in science and techniques in various fields which is equivalent to engineering.The second is the engineering cycle

patterns: Are all fst in Morocco the same
responses: There is diversity from one fst to another.The difference is in the sectors, which are not the same everywhere, the teachers' skills and practical work point of view let take the example of fst Tangier it offers 4 options for the DEUST yet fst Alhoceima it offers only 2 options ( bcg and mip)

patterns: What is the condition for integrating engineering cycle, license or Master at fst
responses: For the license it is to have the DEUST diploma of the faculty where there is this license not of other establishment (faculty of science) or fst of other city, moreover there are fields with very good reputation citing for example civil engineering at fst Tangier, computer engineering They set thresholds for access The Master and the engineering cycle are not accessible to everyone because they are by selection and written and sometimes oral competition

patterns: How many school subjects and exams in each semester
responses: There is 2 semesters per the year Each semester includes 6 modules For each module there will be 2 exams
Math computer science physics chemistry

patterns: What directions are available for further studies for computer engineering license student?
responses: The potential directions for pursuing studies are of the following types: Masters in IT, Masters in e-Technologies, Masters in automatic or industrial IT or business intelligence and engineering training.

responses: depend of teacher

patterns: How many modules we study in one semestre in FSTT?
responses: We study 6 modules each semestre

patterns: What is process engineering? Which trades to work on and which modules to study?
responses: Process engineering is production engineering sector, it is in relation to industry and all kinds of initiating step (transforming raw material) to finished product, the various controls, studies, operations choosing the materials equipment to achieve result, optimizing the cost and time of production and which will satisfy the customer. The professions to occupy production manager, process engineer, work in any industrial chain but on condition of having bac +5 in the specialty the license alone is absolutely insufficient

patterns: Which is the right choice among: fst, est, fs and preparatory class?
responses: If you are person who likes theory, scientific research then fs. You want to study trade know-how totally and you want lot of practice then EST is the right way. You want to memorize the exercises to pass the CNC then guarantee engineering cycle by hand but with 0% baggage then preparatory class. FST for mixture of all these three there is theory, the practice of training courses with good reputation and to continue the bac +5 there are lot of obstacles and filters so you must be among the best of hundreds of competitors

patterns: How many modules we study in one semestre in FSTT?
responses: We study 6 modules each semestre
